mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_WX_CHAT_MSG wxchatmsg where wxchatmsg.ID = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_WX_CHAT_MSG wxchatmsg SET wxchatmsg.IS_REPLAY = #{is_replay:NUMERIC} WHERE wxchatmsg.ID = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_WX_CHAT_MSG wxchatmsg WHERE wxchatmsg.ID=#{id}

DELETE FROM TB_WX_CHAT_MSG WHERE ID in
#{ids}
mapper.select:
SELECT wxchatmsg.*, wxuser.nickname username FROM TB_WX_CHAT_MSG wxchatmsg left join tb_wx_user wxuser on (wxchatmsg.openid = wxuser.openid and wxchatmsg.accountid = wxuser.accountid) WHERE 1=1 and wxchatmsg.C_TYPE=0
and ( or wxchatmsg.C_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or to_char(wxchatmsg.CREATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd') LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%')
)
order by wxchatmsg.CREATETIME desc

SELECT nvl(suser.username, wxuser.nickname) username, wxchatmsg.* FROM (select * from ( select wxcmsg.c_content,wxcmsg.createtime,wxcmsg.openid,wxcmsg.session_id,wxcmsg.userid,wxcmsg.c_type from tb_wx_chat_msg wxcmsg union select wcsession.c_content,wcsession.createtime,wcsession.openid,wcsession.session_id,wcsession.openid userid,2 from tb_wx_chat_session wcsession ) t2 ) wxchatmsg left join tb_user suser on wxchatmsg.userid = suser.userid left join tb_wx_user wxuser on wxchatmsg.openid = wxuser.openid WHERE 1=1 and wxchatmsg.SESSION_ID=#{session_id} order by wxchatmsg.CREATETIME desc

SELECT nvl(suser.username, wxuser.nickname) username, wxchatmsg.* FROM TB_WX_CHAT_MSG wxchatmsg left join tb_user suser on wxchatmsg.userid = suser.userid left join tb_wx_user wxuser on wxchatmsg.openid = wxuser.openid WHERE 1=1
and wxchatmsg.session_id in
